title: Modern Lighting For an Inspired Interior
text:
Mansion Global has highlighted these products and services because we think readers will find them useful. We may earn a commission if you buy products through our links, but our recommendations are independent of any compensation that we may receive.

HLighting has the power to transform. It can set the mood of a room, help dictate the look and feel and influence perception of a space. Accenting with modern lamps, hanging fixtures or sconces is one of the easiest ways to make a room more fashion forward without having to completely overhaul your décor. It’s like the ultimate design accessory to complement your interiors.



Below, six contemporary-style lighting options that will instantly upgrade and add flair to any space.



Jonathan Adler Meurice Rectangle Chandelier

Jonathan Adler's Meurice Rectangle Chandelier is a twist on bamboo. Jonathan Adler

From the modernist master, Jonathan Adler Meurice Rectangle Chandelier is a contemporary take on the look of classic bamboo. With its sculptural silhouette, antiqued brass finish and 21 vertical metal bamboo shoots each topped by globe-shaped bulbs, the piece nods to Hollywood Regency style glamour in a sleek, fashion-forward way.

Jonathan Adler Meurice Rectangle Chandelier is available for $1,673.

Light Society Meridia Sputnik 12-Light Chandelier Pendant

The space-like design of this chandelier means it'll stand out-and it's very affordable too. Amazon

This brass finished Light Society Meridia Sputnik 12-Light Chandelier Pendant adds a burst of mid-century-inspired style overhead. Edison bulbs within give the space-like design an even more modern feel that’s ideal in the living room, dining room or kitchen. Wherever you hang it, the fixture will make a striking statement.



Light Society Meridia Sputnik 12-Light Chandelier Pendant is available for around $84.50.



IC Floor Lamp By Michael Anastassiades for FLOS

This IC Floor Lamp is a feat of engineering FLOS

With its illuminated orb precariously balanced on a slender metal arm, this IC Floor Lamp By Michael Anastassiades for FLOS is both a modern marvel and a feat of engineering. Crafted in bronze, the bracket-shaped stem and glowing sphere illuminate a study, living room or den with modern minimalist appeal and a whole lot of wonder.



The IC Floor Lamp By Michael Anastassiades for FLOS is available for $1,495.

Sonneman Split Disc Wall Light

This aluminum wall sconce is the marriage of form and function. 2modern

Equal parts architecture and ingenuity, Sonneman’s Split Disc Wall Light is an illuminated disc that’s literally split down the middle into two segments, with light emanating from the center and perimeter. Crafted from aluminum, the wall sconce is the perfect marriage of form and function.



Sonneman Split Disc Wall Light is available for $480.



LuceTu Sbarlusc Pink Applique by Isacco Brioschi

This sconce combines minimalism with a bit of glam. Aretemest

A combination of minimalism, modern sophistication and a bit of glam, LuceTu Sbarlusc Pink Applique by Isacco Brioschi is so much more than simply a sconce. The striking-yet-simplistic style light infuses a pop of color and interest. The streamlined metal and glass form features a two-toned double glass cylindrical shade handcrafted by master artisans in Italy.



LuceTu Sbarlusc Pink Applique by Isacco Brioschi is available for $1,520.



Urban Ambiance Luxury Modern Farmhouse Chandelier

This Modern Farmhouse Chandelier is made of brushed nickel. Amazon

This Urban Ambiance Luxury Modern Farmhouse Chandelier is the kind of showpiece that creates conversation wherever you put it. Iterated in brushed nickel, the multi-bulb steel light fixture has a modern industrial feel ideal for hanging over a contemporary dining room table.



The Urban Ambiance Luxury Modern Farmhouse Chandelier is available for around $400.
